item.title: EIOA Class: Integrated Group Assignment(IGA)
item.description: Tasks Load from pickle Calculate for a specific country territorial CO2 emissions Calculate for a specific country consumption-based CO2 emissions Identify top-5 sectors that contribute to territorial emissions of a specific country Identify top-5 final demand expenditure on products that contribute to consumption-based emissions of a specific country Identify top-5 countries where the specific country displaced its emissions to import numpy as np import time import pickle as pkl import os from pathlib import Path np.
